name: Openhouse
description: LGBTQ+ senior housing, case management, mental health, and community programs
fullDescription: Openhouse provides housing, community programs, case management, and mental health services specifically for LGBTQ+ seniors in San Francisco.
whatTheyOffer:
- LGBTQ+-affirming senior housing
- Case management services
- Mental health support
- Social programs and activities
- Aging services and resources
- Community building events
- Volunteer opportunities
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Openhouse for services
2. Apply for senior housing (waitlist may apply)
3. Schedule case management intake
4. Join social programs and activities
5. Must be LGBTQ+ senior (typically 55+)
keywords: Openhouse, San Francisco, LGBTQ, gay, lesbian, trans, queer, senior housing, seniors, 55+, case management, mental health, aging services
